summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类对象提供 的字段的容器。This class object provides the container for the fields of an . 访问 的 属性将检索 对象。Accessing the property of an retrieves an object. 类的属性和方法是 接口的超集。The properties and methods of the class are a superset of the interface. 此接口的所有属性和方法（包括从 ASP.NET 接口继承的属性和方法）都适用于此处。All properties and methods of that interface, including those that it inherits from the ASP.NET interface, are applicable here. 此类提供了用于修改集合的其他属性和方法。This class provides additional properties and methods to modify the collection. 这些属性和方法提供标准的集合管理功能，例如添加、删除和清除集合。These properties and methods provide standard collection management capability, such as adding, removing, and clearing the collection. 如果在 Page_Init 过程中通过调用方法来更改集合 、、或 ，则会忽略对象列表的 、和 属性的视图状态。If you change the collection by calling the methods , , , or during Page_Init, the view state for the , , and properties of the object list is ignored.

span.span: Introduction to the ObjectList Control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在只读 界面中不可用。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 将字段添加到对象列表的字段集合会更改控件的数据绑定行为，并要求您再次将数据绑定到控件。Adding a field to the field collection of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control and requires you to bind data to the control again.

span.span: Introduction to the ObjectList Control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `index` 参数的值为-1，则指定该字段将添加到集合的末尾。A value of -1 for the `index` parameter specifies that the field is added to the end of the collection. 将字段添加到对象列表的字段会更改控件的数据绑定行为，并要求您再次将数据绑定到控件。Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在只读 界面中不可用。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 对于应用此方法的所有类，可以使用 方法。You can use the method for all the classes where this method applies. 例如， 集合的 方法会清除集合中的所有样式;对于 ，它将清除集合中的所有选择。For example, the method for a collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the , it clears all the choices in the collection. 将字段添加到对象列表的字段会更改控件的数据绑定行为，并要求您再次将数据绑定到控件。Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此方法的第二个版本中，它将使用 属性 `fieldId` 搜索字段，并返回第一个匹配字段。In the second version of this method, it searches for a field with the property `fieldId` and returns the first matching field. 如果找不到匹配项，它将使用 属性的 `fieldID` 参数搜索字段，并返回第一个匹配字段。If no match is found, it searches for a field with the property's `fieldID` parameter and returns the first matching field. 否则返回 -1。Otherwise, it returns -1.
